ValidationRule.description: Controls that this field donÂ´t be empty when changing to Proforma Requested Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Community Connections", ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"Proforma Requested"), ISBLANK(Bulk_Video_Package_Name__c), ISPICKVAL( Agreement_Type__c , "Bulk") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bulk Video Package Name is missing.
